thread.title: LIVE: Jeremy McConnell to take DNA test on This Morning to find out the father of Stephanie Davis' baby
thread.title_full: LIVE: Jeremy McConnell to take DNA test on This Morning to find out the father of Stephanie Davis' baby

author: Katie Fitzpatrick
title: LIVE: Jeremy McConnell to take DNA test on This Morning to find out the father of Stephanie Davis' baby
text:
Stephanie Davis and her baby boy Caben-Albi George (Photo: OK! magazine) Share 
Reality stars Jeremy McConnell and Stephanie Davis - who also used to be in Hollyoaks - are taking the remarkable step of ending the row about the father of her baby live on This Morning today - as he takes a DNA test ON AIR. 
The former soap star recently gave birth to son Caben-Albi, saying she was 'completely in love' with her new addition . 
Irish model McConnell and Davis met on Celebrity Big Brother in 2016 and a whirlwind romance followed - ending up in a pregnancy, a break up and Twitter recriminations from both sides. 
Before that, there was the obligatory OK cover shoot and some lovey dovey pictures of them smooching on Instagram. Modern romance eh? Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell (Photo: OK! magazine) 
Davis maintains '100 per cent' the baby is his but McConnell has always denied it - and now the row is set to be ended once and for all. Or at least to an accuracy of 99.9 per cent accuracy. 
Shortly after the newborn arrived, McConnell tweeted: â€œI am delighted that Steph has safely had the baby, of course if he is my son I will absolutely step up and do what I can to support him." 
Strap in. This could get messy. Read More
